item.description: Experience three of Boston's best new buildings with the Boston Latino International Film Festival, happening this week, 12/2-5 at three venues in Boston: Harvard's David Rockefeller Center for Latin American Studies (at the Center for Government and International Studies/CGIS), the new Paramount Center at Emerson downtown, and the new Firehouse Auditorium at Zumix in East Boston. Here's the film schedule and ticket info: http://bliff.org/sche...
item.name: New buildings and foreign films
